name: Diamond Mine excavator 3D: Construction Quarry Haul Truck Driver
name_original: Diamond Mine excavator 3D: Construction Quarry Haul Truck Driver
description:
Take the challenge and enter in mountain cave for extraction of precious diamond and gems. Become a foreman over mining worker crew and operate excavation cranes. Get deep in mines and explore caves for valuable stones in Diamond Mine excavator game.

Operate bucket chain excavator crane for transportation of raw stones and coal rocks from one place to next. Experience extreme truck game in the rocky mountains and hills. Diamond Mine Excavator 3D is not just a car driving game, you will run minecart rail to take out gold rock material for refinery. Rush to clean the rocks and get expensive gem and diamonds in raw material form. Enjoy realistic auto game and drive giant haul trucks inside mountain cave. The latest machinery like bucket wheel excavator is taking scoop out of rocky mountain and collecting stones. Drive mining truck and park it under conveyor belt to collect stones. The rock crushing machine will break the outer surface of coal. Operate heavy excavator crane to scoop and dump stone in haul truck. Then drive mine trucks to the minecart and dump material to transport freight out of hill cave.

Need perfect truck parking skills for steering gigantic machines inside mine caves. Become miners foremen and drive perfect dump trucks for transport raw gold,gemstones and diamonds. After excavation rush to run rail cart across mine on track. Enjoy next-gen construction simulator game in your iPhone and iPads. Become miner explorer in deep mountain caves and collect precious gemstones. Test your realistic driving skills with giant construction cranes. Park perfect without dropping coal cargo from dumping trucks.

Diamond Mine Simulation Features:
10 thrilling extraction missions to drill and collect gems from caves
Operate modern tech machinery for drilling and scooping rocks
Take on driver seat to control steering wheel with acceleration pedal and brake pedal
Real physics engine for driving such massive machinery


Give us your valuable feedback in the reviews section, and help us improve our games in future.
